title: SettingFields
properties: Some Stuff

title: .308 Explosive
properties: Each creature and object within 5 feet of the target takes 3d6 explosive damage. The target falls prone unless their Strength ability score is greater than 10.

title: .308 FMJ
properties: The weapon’s damage is increased by 2. If this damage brings a creature to 0 HP, the attack also targets the next creature behind them in a line.

title: .308 Hollow Point
properties: If the weapon deals damage to a target creature's hit points, it deals extra damage equal to its critical hit damage. If the damage is subtracted by the target’s DT, the damage gains no critical hit bonus and is halved.

title: .308 JSP
properties: The weapon gains Breakable and its damage is increased by 3.

title: .50 Explosive
properties: Each creature and object within 5 feet of the target takes 3d6 explosive damage. The target falls prone unless their Strength ability score is greater than 10.

title: .50 Incendiary
properties: The weapon gains Incendiary

title: .50 Match
properties: The weapon’s damage is increased by 5, the short range modifier is reduced by 2.

title: .357 FMJ
properties: The weapon’s damage is increased by 2. If this damage brings a creature to 0 HP, the attack also targets the next creature behind them in a line.

title: .357 Hollow Point
properties: If the weapon deals damage to a target creature's hit points, it deals extra damage equal to its critical hit damage. If the damage is subtracted by the target’s DT, the damage gains no critical hit bonus and is halved.

title: .357 JFP
properties: The weapon gains Destructive.

title: .44 Hollow Point
properties: If the weapon deals damage to a target creature's hit points, it deals extra damage equal to its critical hit damage. If the damage is subtracted by the target’s DT, the damage gains no critical hit bonus and is halved.

title: .45 Hollow Point
properties: If the weapon deals damage to a target creature's hit points, it deals extra damage equal to its critical hit damage. If the damage is subtracted by the target’s DT, the damage gains no critical hit bonus and is halved.

title: .45-70 Hollow Point
properties: If the weapon deals damage to a target creature's hit points, it deals extra damage equal to its critical hit damage. If the damage is subtracted by the target’s DT, the damage gains no critical hit bonus and is halved.

title: 10mm FMJ
properties: The weapon’s damage is increased by 2. If this damage brings a creature to 0 HP, the attack also targets the next creature behind them in a line.

title: 10mm Hollow Point
properties: If the weapon deals damage to a target creature's hit points, it deals extra damage equal to its critical hit damage. If the damage is subtracted by the target’s DT, the damage gains no critical hit bonus and is halved.

title: 10mm Rubber
properties: The weapon’s damage is instead 1d4+2 and you do not add your agility modifier, if this damage dealt to a target creature’s hit points, they take one level of fatigue. Additionally, if a rubber bullet brings a creature to 0 hit points, they automatically heal 1 point unless the attack was a targeted attack to the head or eyes.

title: 12 guage Cap Shot
properties: The weapon gains the Destructive and Mangle properties. The weapon’s damage ignores 2 points of DT.

title: 12 guage Dragon's Breath
properties: The weapon deals half as much damage but gains Incendiary.

title: 12 guage Flechette
properties: The weapon’s damage total is reduced by 1 but ignores up to 6 points of DT.

title: 12 guage Magnum
properties: The weapon’s damage is increased by 3, ignores 3 points of DT, and its range modifiers are each increased by 2. However, after every second attack; the weapon gains a level of decay.

title: 12 guage Slug
properties: The weapon’s range modifiers are each tripled and it gains the Accurate and Destructive properties. However, it loses its Spread and Powerful properties.

title: 12 guage Pulse Slug
properties: The weapon gains the same effects as the Slug ammunition type. Additionally, when dealing damage to a Robot or a creature in Power Armor; the damage is doubled.

properties: The weapon’s damage is increased by 2. If this damage brings a creature to 0 HP, the attack also targets the next creature behind them in a line.

Additionally, if a rubber bullet brings a creature to 0 hit points, they automatically heal 1 point unless the attack was a targeted attack to the head or eyes.

title: Energy Cell Bulk
properties: The weapon’s damage is reduced by 3. The weapon gains Durable.

title: Energy Cell Optimized
properties: The weapon’s damage is increased by 1 and ignores 1 point of DT.

title: Energy Cell Overcharged
properties: The weapon’s damage is increased by 2 and ignores 2 points of DT. The weapon gains Breakable.

title: Energy Cell Max Charge
properties: The weapon’s damage is increased by 4 and ignores 4 points of DT. The weapon gains Breakable and after every third attack; the weapon gains a level of decay

title: Microfusion Cell Bulk
properties: The weapon’s damage is reduced by 3. The weapon gains Durable.

title: Microfusion Cell Optimized
properties: The weapon’s damage is increased by 1 and ignores 1 point of DT.

title: Microfusion Cell Overcharged
properties: The weapon’s damage is increased by 2 and ignores 2 points of DT. The weapon gains Breakable.

title: Microfusion Cell Max Charge
properties: The weapon’s damage is increased by 4 and ignores 4 points of DT. The weapon gains Breakable and after every third attack; the weapon gains a level of decay

title: Missile Explosive
properties: Each creature and object within 5 feet of the target takes 3d6 explosive damage. The target falls prone unless their Strength ability score is greater than 10.

title: Missile Incendiary
properties: The weapon gains Incendiary

title: Syringer Stimpak Loader
properties: This syringe allows you to load it with a stimpak, the target gains the effects of the stimpak.

title: Syringer ChemLoader
properties: This syringe allows you to load it with a chem, the target gains the effects of the chem.

title: Syringer Radscorpion Venom
properties: Target becomes poisoned for 3 turns and takes 1d6 poison damage at the start of each of their turns.

title: Syringer Endangerol
properties: Target’s DT is reduced by 3 for 1 minute.

title: Syringer Yellow Belly
properties: Target becomes frightened for 3 rounds. (see page #)

title: Syringer Berserk
properties: Target spends all of its AP on its next turn to attack the nearest creature to it.

title: Syringer Hemorrhage
properties: Target gains one level of Bleeding.

title: Syringer Lock Joint
properties: Target becomes slowed for 2 turns.

title: Syringer  Sclerosis
properties: Target becomes Deafened for 3 rounds.

title: Syringer Myopic Serum
properties: Target becomes Blinded for 3 rounds.

title: Syringer Mind Cloud
properties: All creatures beyond 30 feet of the target creature become invisible to them for 1 minute.

title: Syringer Tranquilizer
properties: If the target’s endurance is a 4 or below, they fall unconscious for 1 hour. Otherwise, they become Dazed for their next two turns and fall unconscious for 1 hour at the end of their third turn. Creature’s dazed in this way can remove this condition and prevent falling unconscious by using any chem with the stimulant property.
